fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Spy (Night): Learn the roles of all players who visit your target.
-Falsify (Night): Give a false notification to your target, or give false feedback to override correct feedback. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Your feedback does not need to be accurate to the target's role - yes, you can tell an Investigator that their target is not suspicious.
